code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client as Client
    participant DataTrans as data_transmission.c
    participant Acquisition as acquisition.c
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Connect to data socket
    activate DataTrans
    
    Note over DataTrans,Acquisition: External ADC already initialized during startup
    
    alt mode == 0 (CloudNative_Serverless)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(CloudNative_DockerImage) buffer
            
            opt Socket change detected
                DataTrans->>DataTrans: Break acquisition loop
            end
        end
    else mode == 1 (CloudNative_DockerImage)
        loop Until client disconnects
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Take spi_mutex
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: spi_device_polling_transmit(CloudNative_HelmChart)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: SPI transaction complete
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: Release spi_mutex
            
            DataTrans->>Acquisition: pcnt_unit_get_count(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
            Acquisition-->>DataTrans: Current counter state
            
            alt Edge detected (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
                DataTrans->>Client: non_blocking_send(CloudNative_HelmChart) buffer
            end
        end
    end
    
    Client->>DataTrans: Disconnect
    DataTrans->>DataTrans: safe_close(CloudNative_Serverless)
    deactivate DataTrans
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
